1323970.name: Diamond Giza Demo
1323970.description:
Everybody knows the pyramids are stuffed full of valuable treasure. But they're also stuffed with dangerous monsters that roam the halls and keep the treasure out of the hands of would-be looters. Only a real DIAMOND GIZA could ever hope to come out of there with bags of riches!

This demo gives you the first pyramid of the full game. Fifteen levels stand ready to introduce you to the core gameplay, where up to eight people can play co-operatively on one PC, with any combination of controllers and keyboard, to raid the pharoah's treasure!
1323970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
